# IRandomizationSource.NextFloat method

Gets the next Single that is greater than or equal to 0.0, and less than 1.0.

```csharp
public float NextFloat()
```

## Return Value

A single-precision floating point number that is greater than or equal to 0.0, and less than 1.0.
